bibl.title: Colour in the Ancient Mediterranean World
bibl.note: Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 77 (2005), Bibl. Beilage 3, p. 72.
BARANSKI Marek, Coloured Hellenistic Architectural Remains from El Ashmunein (Hermopolis Magna), Egypt.
Liza CLELAND and Karen STEARS with Glenys DAVIES (Edd.), Colour in the Ancient Mediterranean World = BAR International Series. 1267 (Oxford, 2004) pp. 96-99.
